Posts.Content: It seems they are doing every treatment they can. The doctor just did not seem very positive . I just wondered if others knew anyone that had lived a longer life with Stage III. I didn't realize it was such a grim diagnosis. Thanks to anyone for input.
Posts.Title: Death from stage III cancer

Posts.Content: Well, He said we will do 4 1/2 months of chemo, 5 wks of daily radiation and then put you on herceptin for one year....that's all I know. All this is very new to me. I had a mammogram in june of 09 and they said I was fine and now 10 months later I am StageIII and don't have long to live! My family and I are devastated. There must be a bright side somewhere.
Posts.Title: Death from stage III cancer

Posts.Content: My doctor said I only had a 50% chance of living for five years. It was just a very unexpected statement. Do all of you feel this is the case? Thank-you, Sophie 56
Posts.Title: Death from stage III cancer

Posts.Content: My daughter is 18 and in her first year of college . Tonight she called me in her room and had me feel a LARGE lump in her left breast. I told her I didn't think it was any thing to worry about Iam hysterical. Of course I am taking her to the doctor but can some one tell me ANYTHING?
Posts.Title: 18 year old has large lump in breast HELP Scared Mom 1 2

Posts.Content: Thank-you. She is going to the doctor Wed. Hopefully, we will get good news. Please say a prayer. Sophie
Posts.Title: 18 year old has large lump in breast HELP Scared Mom 1 2

Posts.Content: Linda, we could have gone that biopsy route but the doctor said it had to come out because of the size. I thought that it was an unnecessary thing to go through if it had to come out. Considering your daughter's lump size I personally would do the biopsy first but do not let that influence your decision. No an ultrasound takes less than 30 minutes normally. Please let me know how it turns out. Sophie
Posts.Title: 18 year old has large lump in breast HELP Scared Mom 1 2

Posts.Content: Seraph did they do a biopsy or cut hers out. I am even more scared now. They did an ultrasound and a mammogram this morning and said it was a tumor.
Posts.Title: 18 year old has large lump in breast HELP Scared Mom 1 2

Posts.Content: That is exactly what Haileys' was Linda. They removed hers last Thursday and it was benign . The doctor said 98% of them were but it was a great relief. It is an outpatient surgery. We were there 5 or 6 hours and they gave us results before we left. To all of you that have supported me through this thank-you and I hope I can be of help to you someday. Sophie
Posts.Title: 18 year old has large lump in breast HELP Scared Mom 1 2

Posts.Content: Thanks, hopefully I will update with good news in about 12 hours. Sophie
Posts.Title: 18 year old has large lump in breast HELP Scared Mom 1 2

Posts.Content: I took my daughter to the doctor today. He thinks it is fibroid cyst full of fluid. We are going for a sonogram and a monogram if necessary in the morning. He said it was so large that the fluid will have to drained. I am still uneasy but much better than I was. Sophie
Posts.Title: 18 year old has large lump in breast HELP Scared Mom 1 2

Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by kristie1978 I had one removed two years ago (28 years old) it was benign but a very scary experience regardless. Good Luck!
Posts.Title: 18 year old has large lump in breast HELP Scared Mom 1 2

Posts.Content: Thank-you Ann, I am having chemo May 3rd and I still haven't stopped crying about having stage III breast cancer. I am trying to prepare for the hair loss but can not. I am an absolute wreck but trying hard to pull it all together. Your answer helped. God bless. Sophie 56
Posts.Title: Someone help please ..chemo side effects

Posts.Content: Mine didn't show up for 5 years and now I have late StageII breast cancer!!
Posts.Title: Mammogram and ultrsound clear--why biopsy???

Posts.Content: Mopsy, thank=you so much for replying, when you talk about sickness do you mean vomitng or what? If you don't mind my asking how long did the sickness last? Did they give you any meds to help control it? As you can guess, I am extremely apprehensive and desperate for any info from someone who has been through it. Thank-you again.
Posts.Title: Someone help please ..chemo side effects

Posts.Content: Don't take a chance. I am not trying to scare but a doctor took a chance with my breast and now I am having a mastectomy. It is probably benin and you will be relieved.
Posts.Title: Confused about calcifications

Posts.Content: Hi all, I just found out I have stage III breast cancer and am about to start chemo. Would someone please tell me some of the side effects they experienced? I know everyone's is different but I just need to hear from some people who have been through it. Thank you all, Sophie 56
Posts.Title: Someone help please ..chemo side effects

Posts.Content: Get it done please. I didn't, was advised not to....it turned out to be cancer and I lost the breast. Better for peace of mine. Sophie 56
Posts.Title: Excisional/surgical biopsies - Any advice?
